data.author: Hans Christian Andersen
data.en: Most of the people who will walk after me will be children, so make the beat keep time with short steps.

data.author: Hans Christian Andersen
data.en: Every man's life is a fairy tale written by God's fingers.

data.author: Hans Christian Andersen
data.en: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.

data.author: Hans Christian Andersen
data.en: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.

data.author: Hans Christian Andersen
data.en: My life is a lovely story, happy and full of incident.

data.author: Hans Christian Andersen
data.en: Being born in a duck yard does not matter, if only you are hatched from a swan's egg.
